Articles.Content: an issue i and im sure many many others always get designing landers is that there just arent any ladders that are the correct size.
I definitely agree with that.  Some of the first mods I started using for KSP (and still use when I fire it up) were to get more/better ladder options.
I'd like ladders that get placed like struts: click to start the ladder, click to end the ladder, ladder magically fills itself between the 2 points.
